languages.text: Свита Вольного Торговца неожиданно поредела. Оправдания прозвучали весьма неубедительно — возможно, следует проверить, что происходит в Яме — логове Ревущих.

The Rogue Trader's retinue has suddenly grown smaller. The reasons for the departure did not sound particularly convincing, so perhaps it would be best to investigate what is happening at the Shriekers' den in the Pit.
languages.original_text: Свита Вольного Торговца неожиданно поредела. Оправдания прозвучали весьма неубедительно — возможно, следует проверить, что происходит в Яме — логове Ревущих.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's retinue has suddenly grown smaller. The reasons {mf|his|her} companions have provided did not sound particularly convincing, so perhaps it would be best to investigate what is happening at the Shriekers' den in the Pit.

languages.text: L'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} s'est subitement réduit. Les raisons de ce départ n'étant pas particulièrement convaincantes, il pourrait être intéressant de mener l'enquête sur ce qu'il se passe du côté du repaire des Hurleurs, dans la Fosse.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's retinue has suddenly grown smaller. The reasons for the departure did not sound particularly convincing, so perhaps it would be best to investigate what is happening at the Shriekers' den in the Pit.

traits.locale_text: L'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} s'est subitement réduit. Les raisons de ce départ n'étant pas particulièrement convaincantes, il pourrait être intéressant de mener l'enquête sur ce qu'il se passe du côté du repaire des Hurleurs, dans le gouffre.

languages.text: Das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist gerade kleiner geworden. Die Gründe für die Abreise klangen nicht allzu überzeugend. Es wäre also vielleicht das Beste, herauszufinden, was im Unterschlupf der Kreischer im Loch vor sich geht.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's retinue has suddenly grown smaller. The reasons for the departure did not sound particularly convincing, so perhaps it would be best to investigate what is happening at the Shriekers' den in the Pit.

traits.locale_text: "Das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist gerade kleiner geworden. Die Gründe für die Abreise klangen nicht allzu überzeugend. Es wäre also vielleicht das Beste, herauszufinden, was im Unterschlupf der Kreischer in der Grube vor sich geht.

languages.text: 行商浪人的随行人员突然变少了，那些人离开的原因听起来似乎并不怎么令人信服。或许最好应该调查一下，深坑的尖啸者巢穴中究竟发生了什么事情。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's retinue has suddenly grown smaller. The reasons for the departure did not sound particularly convincing, so perhaps it would be best to investigate what is happening at the Shriekers' den in the Pit.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的随行人员突然变少了，那些人离开的原因听起来似乎并不怎么令人信服。或许最好应该调查一下，深坑的尖啸者巢穴中究竟发生了什么事情。

languages.text: El séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ha encogido repentinamente. Los motivos de la ausencia no eran nada convincentes, así que tal vez sea mejor investigar la situación en la guarida de los Aulladores en el Abismo.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's retinue has suddenly grown smaller. The reasons for the departure did not sound particularly convincing, so perhaps it would be best to investigate what is happening at the Shriekers' den in the Pit.

traits.locale_text: El séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ha encogido repentinamente. Los motivos de la ausencia no eran nada convincentes, así que tal vez sea mejor investigar la situación en la guarida de los Aulladores en el Abismo.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の従者の数が唐突に減った。離脱の理由はあまり説得力のあるものではない。きっとピットにあるシュリーカーのねぐらで何が起きているのかを調査するのが最善だろう。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's retinue has suddenly grown smaller. The reasons for the departure did not sound particularly convincing, so perhaps it would be best to investigate what is happening at the Shriekers' den in the Pit.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の従者の数が唐突に減った。離脱の理由はあまり説得力のあるものではない。きっとピットにあるシュリーカーのねぐらで何が起きているのかを調査するのが最善だろう。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in maiyeti aniden küçüldü. Ayrılma nedenleri, kulağa pek ikna edici gelmedi. Belki Çukur'daki Çığırtkan ininde neler yaşandığını araştırmak, duruma ışık tutabilir.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's retinue has suddenly grown smaller. The reasons for the departure did not sound particularly convincing, so perhaps it would be best to investigate what is happening at the Shriekers' den in the Pit.
